definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup

sentences.english: Marco, Frank and I had won the 1988 European Championship with Holland.
sentences.chinese: 我们三个1988年随国家队拿了欧洲杯。

sentences.english: "The European Championship derails transfer activity, " said Sir Alex.
sentences.chinese: “欧洲杯让转会市场冷清下来，”弗格森爵士说。

sentences.english: Then came the triumph at EURO 2008.
sentences.chinese: 然后，西班牙在2008年欧洲杯上捧杯。

sentences.english: And they snatched victory from the jaws of  defeat in the European Championship Final in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 在2000年的欧洲杯决赛中他们险胜意大利。

sentences.english: What team do you think is the favorite to win this Euro?
sentences.chinese: 你认为那支球队最可能赢得本届欧洲杯？

sentences.english: Can Van Nistelrooy finish as the Euro's top scorer?
sentences.chinese: 范尼会不会成为本届欧洲杯的最佳射手？

sentences.english: I will speak with Peter Kenyon after the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 我在欧洲杯之后会和肯扬谈谈。

sentences.english: Before the tournament, Iceland was not seen as a contender for the European championship.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛前，冰岛队从未被视为欧洲杯的有力竞争者。

definition: Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
Super Cup (various sports)/Super Bowl (American football championship game)
Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
abbr. for 奧林匹克運動會|奥林匹克运动会/Olympic Games/the Olympics
to win a championship/to come out top/to take the cup
